snippet: The governing coalition lost its majority in Parliament after a second faction bailed out.
abstract: Leading governing coalition in Ukraine's parliament loses its majority when its Samopomich faction bails out, further exacerbating political turmoil; developments may lead to early elections, which Pres Petro O Poroshenko fears may destabilize nation even more.
lead_paragraph: The governing coalition lost its majority in Parliament after a second faction bailed out.
